title: If a person sold his watch for Rs 24 and got a percentage of profit equal to the cost price, then what is the price of the watch? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let the cost price of watch = ₹ x. , then profit percentage = x%. Selling price = cost price. (1+ profit %/100). 24 = x.(1+ x/100). or, 24 = x.(100+x)/100. or, x^2 + 100x = 2400. or, x^2 + 100.x -2400 = 0. or, ( x +120).(x - 20) = 0. or, x = -120 (not valid) , 20. Cost price of watch = ₹ 20. Answer.
